parameters.html:
<style>
  body {
    margin: 0;
    height: 100vh;
    overflow: hidden;
    background: repeating-linear-gradient(
      -45deg,
      #296549,
      #296549 10px,
      #295a44 10px,
      #295a44 20px
    );
    background-size: 200% 200%;
    animation: move-stripes 60s linear infinite;
    will-change: background-position; /* Hint to optimize rendering */
  }

  @keyframes move-stripes {
    0% {
      background-position: 100% 100%;
    }
    100% {
      background-position: 0% 0%;
    }
  }
</style>

parameters.text: Tortimer can generally be found at the wishing well.  During Fishing Tourneys he can be found on a random acre.
